desc: I need someone who has experience with applying apex cloth inside of UE4 to material LOD. Ive been using blender and nvidia clothing tool profile but the resulting .apx file makes the engine crash when applying it to the material LOD 0. I tried to search internet for a solution... Maybe using the maya plugin or 3ds would not result in a crash but i dont have those so I can't try it on my own.I am open to other plugins and/or methods to create realisitc cloth as long as the cloth moves with the character and doesnt clip into it when I go to animate. I already have everything modeled and rigged.
title: Urgent need for someone who has used Apex cloth in UE4 to make my cloth realistic.

desc: Hi,I need an informational animation video to explain a medical device.Outline:A person gets sick goes to hospital. The person gets a medical device put into them, but it gets  infected. The person gets more sick, blood pressure rises we see some medical devices and hospital things as the person gets sicker. We see the Infection spread through starting from the device. Person dies.Next part shows a breakdown of the new device and how it can solve this problem.I would like the video to have voice over and text pop up, but I believe I can do the graphics,text and voice. I would like someone to just animate the story and show the devices. Its for a college project, I think the animation can be pretty simple as long as its clear, friendly and has the story.If you could link me some of your style and you can turn it around fast for me that would be great.Thanks.
title: Animation video

desc: I'm looking for somebody who can create short instructional screencasts about various topics. The length of the screencast videos will be between 5 and 20 seconds. Each video will show only 1 thing.Example of topics:How to sort on a column in Google Spreadsheet without the top row being sortedHow to sort on a column in Google Spreadsheet - checkHow to freeze one row in Google SpreadsheetHow to make a cell bold in Google SpreadsheetEach video should show that and only that.All videos should be recorded using a screencast software. With no waterstamps (for example; the pro version of screencast-o-matic). In 1280×720 resolution or higher.Attached are two videos showing what the end result will look like.Payment will be given for each completed video.Please mention the word "Carrot" in your bid. That way I will know you have read all the instructions. Also mention what you would like to get paid per video done. I want to do at least 1000 videos.
title: Record short instructional screencasts

desc: PLEASE NOTE THE BELOW:***DO NOT PLACE BID WITH GENERIC COPY/PASTED PROPOSAL MESSAGE. ALL GENERIC MESSAGES WILL BE IGNORED******ALL PROPOSALS THAT NEGLECT OR DO NOT INCLUDE A LINK DIRECTLY TO HTML5 BANNER AD EXAMPLES WILL BE IGNORED***I am seeking a talented creative designer who:- Has vast experience in HTML5 Ad Design and can provide examples- Exceptional communication skills: Well spoken and written English. Furthermore, a designer that is highly accessible and has quick turn around times.- I want a designer that DOES NOT RUSH projects, but rather, takes the proper time to think about creative ad ideas - ads that capture attention, are focused on the core ad objectives and messages, and overall a designer who invests themselves in ad ideas.- An individual that can read a storyboard/brief and design HTML5 banners.If interested, I ask you to comment on EACH of the 4 bullet points above, and that you provide an HTML5 Ad example(s).Lastly, in your proposal, be sure to provide your estimate for the cost to build the following:1 HTML5 Ad (2560x1886 pixels) - A storyboard (and assets) will be provided for you to follow frame by frame.Keep in mind that AFFORDABILITY is a MAJOR decision factor as we prospect potential designers. A great mix of speed, smarts, cost, and communication will ultimately form our decision. Any questions, please let me know!I am looking for someone that I can work with on an ongoing basis.
